version_description:
Your heart knows things that your mind can’t explain. With our all-new biofeedback integration with Apple Watch, get more accurate and personalised feedback on your performance, making your transformation even more impactful. Enjoy this experience across workouts, meditations, music playlists, and even our bedtime stories. To top this you can now also access the running series on your Apple Watch, no other device is needed.

In short, simply follow your heart this season!

Share your feedback with us as you try it!

This Christmas, we've redecorated our playlists, to make it easy to plug and play. Simply hit the shuffle button and leave all worries behind! Also, since it's the season to make new connections, hit play on your favourite bedtime stories and get to know their authors and narrators! Happy browsing! Psst...keep those feedbacks coming!

I learnt a new word today - Betamorphosis: the process where our dev team turns bugs into butterflies! Watch ‘em fly away as you experience our new version! PS: Don’t forget to share your reviews here :)

I’ve caught the love-bug I guess 'tis the season... enjoy the buzz that comes with this lovely update. Happy Valentine’s Week! Don’t forget to share your love by sending us your feedback!

Hey Mac,
I've missed you a lot during the last few months. So I decided to finally visit you with my amazing suit(case) of features. 

Announcing the release of Ultrahuman's mac app. Now your favorite work screen is also your favorite workout, mindfulness, and sleep destination.

PS: Don't miss our brain music productivity collection. Your favorite work machine is now your favorite productivity tool as well.

The Ultrahuman Apple TV app is finally here! Huzzah! We know the motivation to workout can come at any point, anywhere. To help you get the most out of your Ultrahuman workout, our team has worked real hard to enhance the video player experience. Slowly, but surely, we're hitting that #noexcuses space! Can't wait to hear your feedback :)

Today we have something important to address. There is a Metabolic Health crisis emerging with almost 80%+ of the world’s population dealing with a metabolic disorder. With Ultrahuman Cyborg’s continuous glucose monitoring and instant Health Nudges, our aim is to help millions control/reverse this crisis. Introducing the Ultrahuman Cyborg — The world’s most advanced metabolic fitness platform. Join the revolution.

With this update, we say cheers to freedom...
To choose a healthcare journey personalised for you
To have your own personalized homepage carousel
To try an all-new video player
To say goodbye to those bugs
To say hello to a great app experience
